Pressure Measurement Products
Intelligent Pressure Scanners

front.div:
The DSA (Digital Sensor Array) Pressure modules are all intelligent.
They contain 16 temperature compensated piezoresistive pressure
sensors, 16 bit A/D converter, and a microprocessor. These compact
self contained modules communicate Ethernet TCP/IP. Pressure data
are output in one of 24 Engineering Units. Optional LabVIEW drivers
and OPC server are available. Features include
+/-.05% full scale long term accuracy
500Hz/channel/second sampling speed
Multiple pressure ranges available per DSA
Vacuum, 10 inch H20 up to 1000 psi pressure range
Auto zero offset correction
